levels.description:
Stops attacking, gains <@ba.vup>{damage_resistance:0%}</> <$ba.protect>Sanctuary</>, ATK gradually increases to <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. When skill expires, deals <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to all ground enemies in front and <$ba.stun>stuns</> them for <@ba.vup>{attack@stun}</> sec. 
<@ba.rem>Can manually deactivate skill (skill can be interrupted at any time)</>
